name: What Do You Seek?
description:
Play as a travelling seer telling the fortunes and futures of clients. Using your lectern of notes, peer and into a crystal ball and interpret the symbols to accurately predict the futures of your customers. 

Controls entirely with point and click mouse. 

Created over the course of 4 days for the HakJak 2023 Game Jam. More information about HakJak can be found here https://www.hakjak.com/
